edu.brown.cs.jc124.kdtree

Interface RangeSearchable<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of items to be searched over
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KdTree

    public interface RangeSearchable<T>
    Author:
    jchen an interface for creating collections that can execute searches over ranges of items.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<T> kNearestNeighbors(T point, int k)
      Gets the k-nearest neighbors from the point (includes the point if it in the collection).
      List<T> withinDistance(T point, double distance)
      Finds all neighbors of a point within a certain distance from it.

    • Method Detail

      • kNearestNeighbors

        List<T> kNearestNeighbors(T point,
                          int k)
        Gets the k-nearest neighbors from the point (includes the point if it in the collection).
        Parameters:
        point - the coordinate to look around of
        k - the number of neighbors to find
        Returns:
        the list of size k that has the k-nearest neighbors

      • withinDistance

        List<T> withinDistance(T point,
                       double distance)
        Finds all neighbors of a point within a certain distance from it.
        Parameters:
        point - the coordinate to look around of
        distance - the range to look over, inclusive
        Returns:
        the list of all coordinates within that range
